note.p: Birth: Queen Street, Golden Square, London (23 February 1779)
Education: Eton; St John's College, Cambridge. BA (1800), MA (1803)

Career: Called to the Bar (1806); MP for Wareham (1818-1820); MP for Nottingham (1820-1826 and 1830-1832); Solicitor General to Queen Caroline; Common Sergeant of London (1822-1830); KC (1828); Attorney General (1830); Chief Justice of King's Bench (1832); Privy Councillor (1832); died of paralysis
